H0.text: The World Bog Snorkelling Championships are held annually in which European country. Ireland

H1.text: The World Bog Snorkelling Championships are held annually in which European country. Scotland

H2.text: The World Bog Snorkelling Championships are held annually in which European country. England

H3.text: The World Bog Snorkelling Championships are held annually in which European country. Cyrmu

A4.text: The World Bog Snorkelling Championship, first held in 1988, takes place every August Bank Holiday in the dense Waen Rhydd peat bog, near Llanwrtyd Wells in mid Wales.
